an5.203:1.1: “Pancahi, bhikkhave, angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno angantveva sankham gacchati.
an5.203:2.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi angehi samannagato ranno bhadro assajaniyo rajaraho hoti rajabhoggo, ranno angantveva sankham gacchati.
an5.203:2.4: Evamevam kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa.
an5.203:3.3: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pancahi dhammehi samannagato bhikkhu ahuneyyo hoti pahuneyyo dakkhineyyo anjalikaraniyo anuttaram punnakkhettam lokassa”ti.
